alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Naples, or near Naples, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Quail Creek Estate and Fiddlers Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
